name: places/ChIJ5ZdVwr1ZwokR-JGR7RoeHH8
adrFormatAddress: 68 7th Ave, New York, NY 10011-6647, USA

originalText.text: Wonderful doctor, great staff and awesome service. They were able to squeeze me same day and addressed all my concerns. The doctor was so helpful and the staff was ready to help. The lady in the front was really helpful selecting my pair of glasses and explained all the different options available. I’m definitely coming back.

text.text: Wonderful doctor, great staff and awesome service. They were able to squeeze me same day and addressed all my concerns. The doctor was so helpful and the staff was ready to help. The lady in the front was really helpful selecting my pair of glasses and explained all the different options available. I’m definitely coming back.

originalText.text: I’m really happy with my latest experience at Davis Eyecare! The staff is so attentive and easy to work with. The doctors are educated and very professional. The glasses in the store are beautiful and reasonably priced. Rumor has it, this store is under new owners and management, and it shows!!

text.text: I’m really happy with my latest experience at Davis Eyecare! The staff is so attentive and easy to work with. The doctors are educated and very professional. The glasses in the store are beautiful and reasonably priced. Rumor has it, this store is under new owners and management, and it shows!!

originalText.text:
Experience was okay and the eye exam was good, but I felt nickel and dimed, and mislead about how fast the glasses would arrive.

I asked on the phone if I can use my insurance and get my glasses next week. When I checked out they told me if pay with insurance, I can’t get the glasses next week and they’ll take three weeks to arrive

I asked twice to see glasses under the allowance cap. They didn’t actually show me any glasses under the cap. I’m sure I could have insisted more, but ideally the sales person would listen even if they also show me more expensive glasses as well.

My benefit covers 20% off the frame above the allowance, which they told me did not apply to the glasses I selected. (I can’t find any stipulations of this in my policy)

Finally, I was charged a 2.5% fee for paying by credit card, which they did not inform me about. (And as I understand, credit card surcharges are prohibited in New York State if they are not posted)

Experience was okay and the eye exam was good, but I felt nickel and dimed, and mislead about how fast the glasses would arrive.

I asked on the phone if I can use my insurance and get my glasses next week. When I checked out they told me if pay with insurance, I can’t get the glasses next week and they’ll take three weeks to arrive

I asked twice to see glasses under the allowance cap. They didn’t actually show me any glasses under the cap. I’m sure I could have insisted more, but ideally the sales person would listen even if they also show me more expensive glasses as well.

My benefit covers 20% off the frame above the allowance, which they told me did not apply to the glasses I selected. (I can’t find any stipulations of this in my policy)

Finally, I was charged a 2.5% fee for paying by credit card, which they did not inform me about. (And as I understand, credit card surcharges are prohibited in New York State if they are not posted)

originalText.text: If I can I would give this place a 10 star review. Great service. Excellent communication, at every step of the way. I wish everywhere had people who made their customers feel like they actually matter.

text.text: If I can I would give this place a 10 star review. Great service. Excellent communication, at every step of the way. I wish everywhere had people who made their customers feel like they actually matter.

originalText.text: Call me a HUGE fan of Dr. Frank.  He provides an excellent and thorough exam while explaining everything.   He also has a great sense of humor and has a kindness that is genuine.   His staff is great when comes to picking out a pair of glasses giving you an honest opinion.   The experience is excellent and I recommend Davis Optical knowing you will walk out knowing you were in good hands and were treated with amazing respect.
